faq.howLong: How long does an export take?
faq.howLongAnswer: Most exports complete within a few minutes. Complex requests with large amounts of data may take longer, but GDPR allows up to 30 days for processing.
faq.howLongAvailable: How long is an export available?
faq.howLongAvailableAnswer: Completed exports are available for download for 30 days. After this period, you'll need to request a new export.
faq.howOften: How often can I request an export?
faq.howOftenAnswer: You can request one export per 24 hours. This helps ensure system resources are available for all users.
faq.isSecureAnswer: Yes. Exports are only accessible to you and require authentication to download. Sensitive data like passwords and API key secrets are never included in exports.

createAgent.question: How do I create my first agent?
createAgent.answer: To create your first agent, go to the Agents page and click "Create Agent". Choose a template or start from scratch, configure your agent's capabilities, and save it.

dataSources.question: What data sources are available?
dataSources.answer: GWI Insights provides access to comprehensive consumer behavior data including demographics, psychographics, media consumption, and brand preferences across multiple markets.

inviteTeam.question: How do I invite team members?
inviteTeam.answer: Go to Settings > Team and click "Invite Member". Enter their email address, assign a role, and send the invitation. They will receive an email with instructions to join.

difference.question: What's the difference between agents and workflows?
difference.answer: Agents are AI-powered assistants that can answer questions and generate insights. Workflows are automated sequences that combine multiple agents and actions to accomplish complex tasks.

customize.question: Can I customize agents?
customize.answer: Yes! You can customize agent prompts, capabilities, and behavior. Advanced users can also create custom agents from scratch.

schedule.question: Can I schedule workflows?
schedule.answer: Yes, workflows can be scheduled to run automatically at specified intervals. Go to the Workflows page and set up a schedule for any workflow.

protection.question: How is my data protected?
protection.answer: We use industry-standard encryption, secure data centers, and comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations. Your data is never shared with third parties.

export.question: Can I export my data?
export.answer: Yes, you can export reports, insights, and data in various formats including CSV, PDF, and JSON through the Reports page.

updateFrequency.question: How often is the data updated?
updateFrequency.answer: Our consumer behavior data is updated quarterly. Real-time data is available for certain metrics and can be accessed through our API.

queryCount.question: How many queries can I make?
queryCount.answer: Query limits depend on your plan. Starter plans include 50 queries per month, Professional plans have unlimited queries, and Enterprise plans offer custom limits.

changePlan.question: How do I change my plan?
changePlan.answer: Go to Settings > Billing and click "Change Plan". You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

annualDiscount.question: Do you offer annual discounts?
annualDiscount.answer: Yes! Annual plans receive a 20% discount compared to monthly billing. Contact sales for Enterprise pricing.

queryCount.question: What counts as a query?
queryCount.answer: A query is any request made to an agent, including follow-up questions within the same conversation. Complex multi-step workflows count as a single query.

changePlans.question: Can I change plans at any time?
changePlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and are prorated.

exceedLimit.question: What happens if I exceed my query limit?
exceedLimit.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can purchase additional queries or upgrade your plan.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, all plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

integrations.question: What integrations are included?
integrations.answer: All plans include access to our core integrations (Google Workspace, Slack, Tableau). Enterprise plans include custom integrations.

dataSecurity.question: How does data security work?
dataSecurity.answer: All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. Enterprise plans include additional security features.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Start your 14-day free trial today. No credit card required.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: GWI ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.
introduction.p2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

youProvide.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
youProvide.item1: Account information (name, email, company, job title)
youProvide.item4: Custom data you upload to the platform
youProvide.item5: Queries and prompts you submit to our agents

automatic.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automatic.item2: Usage data (features used, time spent, interactions)
automatic.item3: Log data (IP address, access times, pages viewed)

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUse.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
howWeUse.item2: Process transactions and send related information
howWeUse.item3: Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
howWeUse.item4: Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
howWeUse.item5: Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities
howWeUse.item6: Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

serviceProviders.label: Service Providers:
serviceProviders.text: Third parties that help us operate our platform

legal.label: Legal Requirements:
legal.text: When required by law or to protect our rights

businessTransfers.label: Business Transfers:
businessTransfers.text: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

consent.label: With Your Consent:
consent.text: When you give us permission to share

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption at rest and in transit, regular security assessments, and access controls. We are SOC 2 Type II certified.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. We will retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
yourRights.item1: Access the personal information we hold about you
yourRights.item4: Object to or restrict certain processing

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

childrensPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 123 Tech Hub, Shoreditch, London EC2A 4BX

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using GWI's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our services.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: GWI provides an AI-powered consumer insights platform that enables users to access consumer research data, create AI agents for data analysis, build automated workflows, and generate reports. The specific features available to you depend on your subscription plan.

registration.title: 3. Account Registration
registration.intro: To use our services, you must:
registration.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
registration.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
registration.item3: Promptly update your information if it changes
registration.item4: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
registration.item5: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.item1: Use the service for any unlawful purpose
acceptableUse.item2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
acceptableUse.item3: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
acceptableUse.item4: Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code
acceptableUse.item5: Use automated systems to access the service beyond permitted limits
acceptableUse.item6: Share account credentials with unauthorized users
acceptableUse.item7: Resell or redistribute the service without authorization

ourProperty.label: Our Property:
ourProperty.text: The service, including all content, features, and functionality, is owned by GWI and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

yourContent.label: Your Content:
yourContent.text: You retain ownership of any data or content you upload. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use it solely for providing the service to you.

dataPrivacy.title: 6. Data and Privacy
dataPrivacy.content: Your use of the service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By using our service, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in our Privacy Policy.

payment.title: 7. Payment Terms
payment.item1: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis
payment.item2: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
payment.item3: We may change pricing with 30 days' notice
payment.item4: Failure to pay may result in suspension of access
payment.item5: You are responsible for all applicable taxes

availability.title: 8. Service Availability
availability.content: We strive to provide reliable service but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time. Planned maintenance will be communicated in advance when possible.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, GWI shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly.

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless GWI and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease. We may terminate or suspend access immediately for violations of these terms.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 123 Tech Hub, Shoreditch, London EC2A 4BX

hero.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
hero.subtitle: Your data security is our top priority. We've built GWI with security at every layer.

encryption.title: Encryption at Rest & Transit
encryption.description: All data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit.

accessControls.title: Access Controls
accessControls.description: Role-based access control (RBAC) with granular permissions and SSO support.

auditLogging.title: Audit Logging
auditLogging.description: Comprehensive audit logs for all user actions and API access.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with 99.99% uptime SLA.

penetrationTesting.title: Regular Penetration Testing
penetrationTesting.description: Third-party security assessments and penetration testing conducted quarterly.

training.title: Employee Security Training
training.description: All employees undergo regular security awareness training.

dataResidencySection.title: Data Residency
dataResidencySection.subtitle: Choose where your data is stored to meet compliance requirements.

complianceSection.title: Compliance & Certifications
complianceSection.subtitle: We maintain the highest standards of compliance and undergo regular third-party audits.

cta.title: Have security questions?
cta.subtitle: Our security team is happy to discuss our practices and answer any questions.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the site owners. We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our platform.

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our service

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: We use services from the following third parties that may set cookies on your device:

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.intro: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

browser.label: Browser Settings:
browser.text: Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies. Check your browser's help documentation for instructions.

preferences.label: Cookie Preferences:
preferences.text: Use our cookie preference center (accessible via the cookie banner) to manage non-essential cookies.

optOut.label: Opt-Out Links:
optOut.text: Many advertising networks offer opt-out mechanisms through sites like aboutads.info.

managing.note: Note that blocking some cookies may impact your experience on our platform.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please check this page periodically for updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 123 Tech Hub, Shoreditch, London EC2A 4BX
